segments.text: Jenny , are you having a good time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . This is a really wonderful party with interesting people and great food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m glad you are enjoying yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s my pleasure . Can I get you another glass of champagne ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ d love another glass . You ’ re a wonderful host . Thank you for everything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s my pleasure having you here .
segments.speaker: S1
